NK039(ti)014:1: // ma mo 'khrugs bskang gi dbu phyogs so //
NK039(ti)014:2: ma mo'i 'khrugs pa bskang ba ni /
NK039(ti)014:3: shin tu gnyan pas gal thod thod du mi bya'o //
NK039(ti)014:4: b+h+yo snyigs ma lnga yi dus byung na bka' bzhin
NK039(ti)014:5: mi byed bka' stsal bkram gsang sngags mi gsang nor
NK039(ti)014:6: la brtseng bon du gyer zhing grong bsnyen byed mngon
NK039(ti)014:7: du gyer zhing mngon spyod byed don mi rtogs shing
NK039(ti)014:8: zung du spyod nang 'thab byed cing 'dul khrims nyams
NK039(ti)014:9: slob dpon pha ma'i bka' bcag cing skye bo rang
NK039(ti)014:10: sdig spyod pa'i tshe de tshe srid pa'i ma mo
NK039(ti)014:11: 'khrugs 'khrug pa'i ma mo'i thugs dam bskang bskang ngo
NK039(ti)014:12: bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang gzhan yang ma mo 'khrug
NK039(ti)014:13: pa'i rgyu mchod pa lo zlar 'das pa dang khas
NK039(ti)014:14: blang dge ba chags pa dang yo byad nyams dang
NK039(ti)014:15: rdzas ma tshangs bzlas brjod bar chad byed pa dang
NK039(ti)014:16: phud nyams lhag ma'i gtor ma dang bden nam mi
NK039(ti)014:17: bden bsam pa dang the tshom som nyi zos pa
NK039(ti)014:18: yi sgrub pa'i ma mo 'khrug par 'gyur de tshe
NK039(ti)014:19: srid pa'i ma mo 'khrug 'khrug pa'i ma mo'i thugs
NK039(ti)014:20: dam bskang bskang ngo bskal sku yi phyag rgya ring
NK039(ti)014:21: du spang rdo rje slob dpon ma mnyes dang rdo
NK039(ti)014:22: rje spun la dam tshig med sku yi dam tshig
NK039(ti)014:23: nyams gyur pa'i de tshe srid pa'i ma mo 'khrug
NK039(ti)014:24: 'khrug pa'i ma ma'i thugs dam bskang bskang ngo bskal
NK039(ti)014:25: pa'i gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu bzlas brjod
NK039(ti)014:26: phyag rgya rgyun chad pas gsung gi dam tshig nyams
NK039(ti)014:27: gyur pa'i bskang ngo gsang ba'i man ngag spel ba
NK039(ti)014:28: yis thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur pa'i bskang ngo
NK039(ti)014:29: ta na g+aa na lnga mi spyod yan lag dam
NK039(ti)014:30: tshig nyams gyur bskang ngo ma mo 'khrug pa'i spyod
NK039(ti)014:31: pa ni yug sa dag la chags pa dang sbrum
NK039(ti)014:32: ma mi dga' bcug pa dang pha med bu tsha
NK039(ti)014:33: spangs ba dang bong bu brtsegs brdung bsgyur ba dang
NK039(ti)014:34: ral gri dag la ma mos dang rma bya ring
NK039(ti)014:35: du spangs pa dang khu ba dkar dmar ma brten
NK039(ti)014:36: dang ma la dad pa log pa dang ne'u le
NK039(ti)014:37: rkyang pa bkram pa dang shing lo rlung khyer ma
NK039(ti)014:38: bzung dang rdo sol chu la bsgyur ba dang 'tshubs
NK039(ti)014:39: mthong nas ma mos dang rjes chags ma byang rak+ta
NK039(ti)014:40: spangs yongs su ma smin sems can la lha yi
NK039(ti)014:41: kha dog bstan pa dang snying po gsang sngags gyer
NK039(ti)014:42: ba dang phyag rgya gzhan la gyer ba dang rtag
NK039(ti)014:43: tu dam tshig bzlo ba dang dus tshod mchod pa
NK039(ti)014:44: chags pa dang bsnyen pa grangs kyi ma them dang
NK039(ti)014:45: sangs rgyas sku gzugs ma bris dang bram ze mchog
NK039(ti)014:46: srid spangs pa dang dam tshig phyag rgya ma brten
NK039(ti)014:47: dang bya nag lug nag khyi nag ma brten dang
NK039(ti)014:48: mched dang lcam dral zhe gcod pas ma mo dpon
NK039(ti)014:49: g.yog 'khrugs par 'gyur de tshe srid pa'i ma mo
NK039(ti)014:50: 'khrug pa'i bskang ngo bskal pa'i gzhan yang dam tshig
NK039(ti)014:51: nyams pa'i rgyu ma nyes bgegs chen btags pa dang
NK039(ti)014:52: sa bdag klu gnyan rgyud dkrug dang dam tshig nyams
NK039(ti)014:53: su bcug pa dang mi thub lha 'dre do bsdos
NK039(ti)014:54: pas 'jig rten ma mo 'khrug par 'gyur de tshe
NK039(ti)014:55: srid 'khrug pa'i ma mo'i bskang ngo gzhan yang ma
NK039(ti)014:56: mo 'khrug pa'i rgyu bka' drin can gyi slob dpon
NK039(ti)014:57: la sgyu ma'i nor gyis ma mnyes pas drin chen
NK039(ti)014:58: dam tshig mi ster ro dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu
NK039(ti)014:59: yang med rang nyid shes rab chung ba yis don
NK039(ti)014:60: dam rtogs pa'i dus yang med 'jig rten ma mo
NK039(ti)014:61: 'khrug par 'gyur de tshe srid 'khrug pa'i bskang ngo
NK039(ti)014:62: gzhan yang ma mo 'khrug pa'i rgyu mtshan ma cung
NK039(ti)014:63: zad bul ba'i tshe ma mo gnad la bor nas
NK039(ti)014:64: ni mi mthun 'khor lo bcas byas nas ma mo
NK039(ti)014:65: 'khrug pa'i sngags kyang bzlas snying rtog byed cing las
NK039(ti)014:66: kyi gzer sems 'khrug nga ro mi bsnyen pas dam
NK039(ti)014:67: du bdar cing g.yab mo 'debs de tshe srid 'khrug
NK039(ti)014:68: pa'i bskang ngo ma mo 'khrug pa'i 'jig rten du
NK039(ti)014:69: mi mthun sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ma mo nang
NK039(ti)014:70: 'thab mtshon cha 'khrug gcan gzan 'khrug cing 'thab pa
NK039(ti)014:71: dang bya nag rnams kyang nang 'thab byed me yi
NK039(ti)014:72: lus la tshig nyams byed bud med smra ba mang
NK039(ti)014:73: po byed ngu 'bod byed cing 'thab mo brdeb ngo
NK039(ti)014:74: 'dzum nag cing kha dog ngan gos kyang kha dog
NK039(ti)014:75: ngan pa yin dgra byung zer zhing phu mdar rgyug
NK039(ti)014:76: mig tshug lag bstsog brgol bar 'gyur dmag mi rnams
NK039(ti)014:77: kyang nang 'thab byed 'khor yang mi brtan dbyen la
NK039(ti)014:78: dga' bdag kyang mi dga' rlung sems 'phyo yid la
NK039(ti)014:79: mi 'dod sna tshogs 'byung 'jig rten 'di na gza'
NK039(ti)014:80: yang 'khrugs skar mda' lhung dang sa g.yos 'khrugs 'ur
NK039(ti)014:81: sgra thug chom mi chad grags khrag gi na bon
NK039(ti)014:82: dmar dang ser nag pos stong gsum gang ba dang
NK039(ti)014:83: sngon pos stong gsum 'byung bar 'gyur khrag gi char
NK039(ti)014:84: pa stong khams gang thog dang ser ba bu yug
NK039(ti)014:85: 'tshubs dus min kha char drag po 'bebs 'tshubs ma
NK039(ti)014:86: mang pos ri lung gang mi la srog chags thams
NK039(ti)014:87: cad sdang gshin rje a wa glang mgo yi sa
NK039(ti)014:88: rim pa dgu yi 'og shed na mdze nad rnam
NK039(ti)014:89: pa sna tshogs btang gdon dang yams nad mang bar
NK039(ti)014:90: byed de tshe bskang bar byed pa yin bskang ngo
NK039(ti)014:91: bskal tshad nad 'brum nad mang po btang rim nad
NK039(ti)014:92: sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur glo bur nad tsha mang
NK039(ti)014:93: ba dang phyug dang zhing ni gdon gyi khyer de
NK039(ti)014:94: tshe bskang bskang ngo gzhan yang ma mo 'khrug pa'i
NK039(ti)014:95: rtags bros shing mi sdug gzugs su ston rgyab kyi
NK039(ti)014:96: phyogs su tshur la blangs 'khor ra byed cing brang
NK039(ti)014:97: la brdungs che tshul byed cing ba ga ston de
NK039(ti)014:98: yang ma mo 'khrug pa'i rtags de tshe srid pa'i
NK039(ti)014:99: 'khrug pa'i bskang ngo gzhan yang ma mo 'khrug pa'i
NK039(ti)014:100: rtagasah ral gri chags dang bong bu 'thing drel khyi
NK039(ti)014:101: phrad dang rma bya rnyag zla ba phyed dang nyi
NK039(ti)014:102: ma thal me yi tshig dang chu yi khyer de
NK039(ti)014:103: yang 'khrug pa'i ma mo yang bskang ngo gzhan yang
NK039(ti)014:104: ma mo chad pa'i rtags bya nag gtor ma mi
NK039(ti)014:105: za zhing bca' rog byed cing phar la 'gro thib
NK039(ti)014:106: thib dang ni tal tal smra ring grogs byed cing
NK039(ti)014:107: 'bod 'grogs byed bud med mang po ngu bzhin du
NK039(ti)014:108: bkra mi shes pa'i tshig kyang brjod rang nyid gcer
NK039(ti)014:109: bur bud pa dang gos dang kha dog ngan pa
NK039(ti)014:110: rmis 'tshub ma thud du 'khyil ba dang rked du
NK039(ti)014:111: chags dang ral ba dang mthur du rgyug cing dum
NK039(ti)014:112: bur btang de yang ma mo chad rtags yin de
NK039(ti)014:113: tshe bskang bar byed pa yin 'khrug pa'i ma mo'i
NK039(ti)014:114: bskang ngo gzhan yang ma mo chad rtags yin rgol
NK039(ti)014:115: zhing ngo nag cho nges 'debs mtshon byung dgra rgol
NK039(ti)014:116: phu mdar rgyugs 'jig rten bud med mang po ni
NK039(ti)014:117: ngu 'bod thal mo brdeb cing byon ngo nag byed
NK039(ti)014:118: cing 'bebs mi nyan de ma ltar bsten pa'i nyams
NK039(ti)014:119: rtags yin bskang ngo khrel 'dzem byed cing lkog na
NK039(ti)014:120: gab ngo nag byed cing 'thab mo 'ong de sring
NK039(ti)014:121: ltar bsten pa'i nyams rtags yin bskang ngo mtshang bru
NK039(ti)014:122: 'thab mo gsang zhing byed tshul la gtam zhing phar
NK039(ti)014:123: la 'gro de mdza' ltar bsten pa'i nyams rtags yin
NK039(ti)014:124: de tshe srid pa'i ma mo 'khrug 'khrug pa'i ma
NK039(ti)014:125: mo'i skong ngo lto mkhon byed cing ngo 'dzum nag
NK039(ti)014:126: mchu 'bug byed cing lkag na gab 'thab mo btags
NK039(ti)014:127: so zhes kyang zer de dran ltar bsten pa'i nyams
NK039(ti)014:128: rtags yin de tshe srid pa'i 'khrugs pa'i ma mo'i
NK039(ti)014:129: bskang ngo gzhan yang ma mo chad rtags ni bong
NK039(ti)014:130: bu mchong stag 'gros kyang byed gsod dang rgol dang
NK039(ti)014:131: gcod pa mthong rlung nag 'tshubs ma'i nang nas phyin
NK039(ti)014:132: tshur la mi 'ong phar la 'gro gcan gzan phar
NK039(ti)014:133: spyang mang pos kyang za 'dod byed nas phar la
NK039(ti)014:134: 'gro 'bud du bzung zhing bud med kyang na'o tsha'o
NK039(ti)014:135: zer zhing phar la 'gro bud med rkub dang b+aa
NK039(ti)014:136: ga bzung zhing du za 'dod byed nas phar la
NK039(ti)014:137: 'gro za 'dod sbyor 'dod zer zhing ni tshul la
NK039(ti)014:138: mi 'ong phar la 'gro de tshe bskang bar byed
NK039(ti)014:139: pa yin skong ngo gzhan yang ma mo chad rtags
NK039(ti)014:140: ni bud med shin tu ngu ba dang bong bu
NK039(ti)014:141: sha'am chags pa dang ral gri chag gam ne le
NK039(ti)014:142: shi me rlung lcags sgrog shing dam chags sbyor dang
NK039(ti)014:143: nad dang rgol ba dang ngu dang mkhun dang skyugs
NK039(ti)014:144: pa dang rgyal dang mgo na glad pa dang sna
NK039(ti)014:145: khrag byung dang rma rtsal 'dod shi dang na dang
NK039(ti)014:146: tsha ba dang bying dang rmug dang rgod ba dang
NK039(ti)014:147: de tshe bskang ngo dgra gzugs mdun du bzhag byas
NK039(ti)014:148: nas mi khrag rta khrag phyar nas ni lha gnyan
NK039(ti)014:149: gzu dang dpang btsugs te gnam du 'o dod bos
NK039(ti)014:150: nas ni nyin khyer mtshan khyer byas nas su dmigs
NK039(ti)014:151: bya mi 'chi mi grangs 'phel yid kyang chad la
NK039(ti)014:152: lha yang gan de tshe bskang bskang ngo gzhan yang
NK039(ti)014:153: bar chad zhugs pa'i rtags rang yang 'jigs shing 'gro
NK039(ti)014:154: snying 'dod gnyid bro snying ni mi dga' smra skye
NK039(ti)014:155: zhing bkres la kha rlon byed ngu snying 'dod la
NK039(ti)014:156: 'gro snying 'dod bud med gzugs mthong rkub dang b+aa
NK039(ti)014:157: ga ston de tshe bskang ngo gtor ma dus las
NK039(ti)014:158: yol ba'i tshe b+aa ga ston dang sngon gyi dbang
NK039(ti)014:159: rtags ston dud pa 'khrigs dang bud med glen pa
NK039(ti)014:160: mthong de tshe bskang ngo ma mo dbang du ma
NK039(ti)014:161: 'dus na mi sdug gzugs su ston cing 'dre mor
NK039(ti)014:162: bardzusa gcan gzan za 'ong ma mos gsheg 'khrug go
NK039(ti)014:163: de tshe bskang bskang ngo bsgrub rtags ring ba'i rtags
NK039(ti)014:164: su rgyang glu len bar chad 'ong ba'i rtags su
NK039(ti)014:165: 'bag 'bug bzlo so sgra sgrigs nas gzhan dang 'thab
NK039(ti)014:166: mo 'ong kha la 'o 'byams sbyor ba 'dod pa
NK039(ti)014:167: yin de tshe bskang bskang ngo ma mo bzhad na
NK039(ti)014:168: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rtags sbyor ba byed na dngos
NK039(ti)014:169: grub ster ba'i rtags bro gar byed na ci bsam
NK039(ti)014:170: 'grub pa'i rtags 'dzum bag ldan pas rang nyid tshe
NK039(ti)014:171: ring rtags sha ba zhon na dkor nor 'phel ba'i
NK039(ti)014:172: rtags de tshe bskang bskang ngo gzhan yang ma mo
NK039(ti)014:173: bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma ni mngon sum byung ngam rtags
NK039(ti)014:174: kyi rmi lam dang dngos grub blang ba'i ched du
NK039(ti)014:175: yang yang nas yang du thugs dam bskang da ni
NK039(ti)014:176: ma mo 'bod pa'i rdzas lnga'i thugs dam bskang g.yab
NK039(ti)014:177: dar tas sti mi tshil dang lcog zhun bdug spos
NK039(ti)014:178: dag gi bskang ma mo 'bad pa'i rdzas drug ni
NK039(ti)014:179: thod pa'i rtags sprod sku mkhar dang thod brtsal ral
NK039(ti)014:180: gri g.yang gzhi dang bya nag gshel nag go zu
NK039(ti)014:181: nag po yis bskang ngo yang ma mo mchod pa'i
NK039(ti)014:182: bskang ba ni ke ra'i sha dang de mo'i sha
NK039(ti)014:183: dri sha dbang po rnam lnga dang 'chi kha mtshal
NK039(ti)014:184: thig dmar po yis sha khrag gtor ma bdud rtsi
NK039(ti)014:185: dang gur gum mngar khrag a mri ta shel nag
NK039(ti)014:186: byang sems dkar dmar gyis ma mo rnams kyi bskang
NK039(ti)014:187: ngo mur mthar khyab pa'i thugs dam bskang ma ltar
NK039(ti)014:188: 'khrug pa'i bskang ba ni na chung tshal dang mi
NK039(ti)014:189: dbang sha rak+ta bdud rtsi sha med dang dbugs med
NK039(ti)014:190: srog med rnams kyis bskang khrag med rus med rnams
NK039(ti)014:191: kyis bskang bran ltar 'khrug pa'i bskang ba ni kha
NK039(ti)014:192: ti sha dang drel gyi sha rkang dmar zangs kyi
NK039(ti)014:193: glad pa dang shing tog me tog rnams kyis bskang
NK039(ti)014:194: sring ltar 'khrug pa'i bskang ba ni drel gyi sha
NK039(ti)014:195: dang spyang mo'i sha rta nag sha dang rak+tasa bskang
NK039(ti)014:196: bskang ngo mdza' ltar 'khrugs pa'i bskang ba dang ngang
NK039(ti)014:197: pa dang ni so bya dang bya nag dang ni
NK039(ti)014:198: lug nag dang a mri ta yi thugs dam bskang
NK039(ti)014:199: rje mo 'khrug pa'i bskang ba ni rak+ta sman dang
NK039(ti)014:200: glad pas bskang dam bdar 'bod cing zil gyis gnon
NK039(ti)014:201: bdud rtsi drong la gsol ba 'debs yang zhig thugs
NK039(ti)014:202: dam bskang ba ni tri shul phyag rgya 'di yis
NK039(ti)014:203: bskang kha t+wam kha dang ral gri mu tras bskang
NK039(ti)014:204: 'bru zan ngar mi'i rgyas pas bskang bya gcan sna
NK039(ti)014:205: tshogs gzugs kyis bskang gom pa'i stabs kyi gar gyis
NK039(ti)014:206: bskang b+han+d+ha rak+tasa bskang bas bskang sbyin sreg chen po
NK039(ti)014:207: rnams kyis bskang sha chen rnams dang gtor ma dang
NK039(ti)014:208: glang po chen po rnam bcu dang bya rog sha
NK039(ti)014:209: dang de mo'i sha de mo'i sgo nga rnams kyis
NK039(ti)014:210: bskang bskang ngo zhing gi khog pa dur khrod dang
NK039(ti)014:211: sha khrag rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'jig rten 'das
NK039(ti)014:212: dang 'jig rten gyis mkha' 'gro rnams kyis thugs dam
NK039(ti)014:213: bskang ras kyi mi mgo gtum po la dman mo
NK039(ti)014:214: rnams kyis ming bris nas bong bu zhon nas sngags
NK039(ti)014:215: kyis bskor 'bru zan sha chen a mri ta khrag
NK039(ti)014:216: dang snying dang mi dgos bskang rin chen rnam pa
NK039(ti)014:217: sna tshogs dang sna tshogs sbyor ba bdug spos dang
NK039(ti)014:218: bu chung snying dang rdzas kyis bskang bskang ngo tsit+ta
NK039(ti)014:219: rtsa lag ma nyams dang bu chung sbu gu ma
NK039(ti)014:220: nyams dang na chung 'byung ba'i mtshal dang ni b+han+d+ha
NK039(ti)014:221: mtshan ldan nang du ni sman dang mtshal gyi bkang
NK039(ti)014:222: bas bskang bskang ngo glang chen sha dang mi dbang
NK039(ti)014:223: sha ne'u le dang rma bya'i sha bud med gtsang
NK039(ti)014:224: mar sbyor ba yis byang chub sems dang tshal gyis
NK039(ti)014:225: bskang bya nag shel nag bong bu yis sman dang
NK039(ti)014:226: gtor ma mang pos bskang shing 'bras me tog sna
NK039(ti)014:227: tshogs dang sha khrag mi dbang rdo sol dang ral
NK039(ti)014:228: gri la sogs rdzas rnams kyis bskang ngo srog med
NK039(ti)014:229: ma ni srog gi bskang dbugs med ma ni dbugs
NK039(ti)014:230: kyis bskang sha med ma ni sha yis bskang rus
NK039(ti)014:231: med ma ni rus kyis bskang khrag med ma ni
NK039(ti)014:232: khrag gi bskang bskang ngo gzhan yang srog gis bskang
NK039(ti)014:233: ba ni bya nag lug nag srog gis bskang mi
NK039(ti)014:234: dbang bya lug snying gis bskang mi rus rkang king
NK039(ti)014:235: la sogs pa'i rgyud pa'i 'brel bas rnams kyi ni
NK039(ti)014:236: mo rigs dag gi mngal khrag dang na chung las
NK039(ti)014:237: byung zag pa'i khrag mi dbang snying khrag rnams kyis
NK039(ti)014:238: bskang yang zhig rdzas kyi bskang ba ni bdag gi
NK039(ti)014:239: spyi bor khrag dang ni sna khrag bya mo'i snying
NK039(ti)014:240: khrag dang khrag sna mang pos bskang gyur cig shel
NK039(ti)014:241: nag spyi dkar mang po rigs dmigs pa rkang dang
NK039(ti)014:242: rkang mar bcas bam dang rta dang gu gu glang
NK039(ti)014:243: glad pa'i rtsa chen phug pa'i khrag srin lag khrag
NK039(ti)014:244: dang sna khrag dang gzhan yang khrag sna mang po
NK039(ti)014:245: yi yang nas yang du mchod pa 'bul thugs dam
NK039(ti)014:246: gnyan po bskang gyur cig bya khyi ra lug phag
NK039(ti)014:247: dang g.yag sha khrag gtor ma mang po dang snying
NK039(ti)014:248: sna'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang rdo rje rgyal po
NK039(ti)014:249: rgyal theb dang las kyi karma grogs mched dang bdag
NK039(ti)014:250: cag 'dir 'dus 'khor dang bcas rgyu 'byor yon bdag
NK039(ti)014:251: 'khor bcas la mi la na tsha ma btang cig
NK039(ti)014:252: phyug la god kha ma btang cig zhing la btsa'
NK039(ti)014:253: sad ser gsum ma btang cig bdud kyi zhags pa
NK039(ti)014:254: nag mo chod gshin rje'i khram kha dgra la bsgyur
NK039(ti)014:255: btsan gyi shwa d+hil dgra la spos bdag cag rnal
NK039(ti)014:256: 'byor 'khor bcas la tshe la bar chad ma btang
NK039(ti)014:257: cig srog la hur thum ma btang cig dbus kyi
NK039(ti)014:258: gtso mo ma yo cig 'khor gyi ma mo ma
NK039(ti)014:259: 'khrug cig nang gi gtso mo ma 'khrug cig phyi
NK039(ti)014:260: yi brtan ma ma gyes cig bskang ngo bskal bar
NK039(ti)014:261: thugs dam bskang bcol pa'i phrin las grub par mdzod
NK039(ti)014:262: gnod par byed pa'i dam sri dang sdang bar byed
NK039(ti)014:263: pa'i dgra bo rnams lo dang zla ba ma bzhag
NK039(ti)014:264: cig zhag dang za mar myur du sgrol bcol ba'i
NK039(ti)014:265: phrin las grub par mdzod dpal ldan lha mo nag
